DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2 IV Gallium Study Patients With Cystic Fibrosis ( IGNITE Study )
DOC.detailed_description: This phase 2 , multi-center , randomize , placebo-controlled trial adult CF chronically infect P. aeruginosa . The study evaluate safety clinical efficacy five day infusion IV gallium nitrate ( IV gallium ) . The purpose study assess efficacy IV gallium improve pulmonary function measure 5 % great relative improvement force expiratory volume one second ( FEV1 ) baseline Day 28 .
